title: President felicitates Sheikh Muhammad bin Zayed on his election
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 15 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Sunday congratulated Sheikh Muhammad bin Zayed Al Nahyan on his election to the office of President of the United Arab Emirates.
In his felicitation message, the president said Pakistan highly valued its brotherly relations with the UAE and expressed the confidence that under Sheikh Muhammadâ€™s leadership, these bilateral ties between the two countries would grow further.
He said that UAE would further witness progress under the leadership of the newly elected president.
